pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - ProCasino 18+ ProCasino Home Choose us Our promise Our products Why are we Services Privacy Policy We employ cookies and other tracking technologies, such as web beacons and pixels, to gather insights into your interactions with our website. Cookies, which are small data files stored on your device when you visit a website, enable us to recognize your device and recall your preferences and settings for future visits to our site. We utilize cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes: Improving Functionality and Performance: Enhancing the functionality and performance of our site to ensure seamless navigation and efficient operation. Remembering Preferences and Settings: Storing your preferences and settings, such as language and location preferences, to personalize your browsing experience and streamline your interactions with our site. Analyzing Site Usage and Marketing Campaign Effectiveness: Analyzing how visitors use our site and assessing the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. This helps us optimize our content and promotional strategies to better meet user needs and interests. Personalizing User Experience: Tailoring content and offers based on your browsing behavior and preferences. This personalization aims to provide you with relevant information and promotions that align with your interests. You have the ability to manage the use of cookies and other tracking technologies through your browser settings. Most browsers provide options to reject all cookies, accept only certain types of cookies, or receive a notification before a cookie is stored on your device. It's important to note that if you choose to reject cookies, some features and functionalities of our site may not be accessible to you. ProCasino, headquartered in Australia, may transfer, store, and process your personal information in Australia or other countries where our service providers operate. These countries may have data protection laws that differ from those in your country. By using our site, you consent to the transfer, storage, and processing of your personal information in Australia and other countries as necessary. In the event of a data breach impacting your personal information, we will promptly notify you and take appropriate measures to minimize any potential harm. We will also inform relevant regulatory authorities as required by applicable laws and regulations. The ProCasino name, logo, and all other trademarks, service marks, and logos featured on our site are the property of ProCasino or its licensors. Their use without our prior written consent is strictly prohibited. Our site may allow you to submit user-generated content such as reviews or comments ("User Content"). While you retain ownership of any User Content you submit, by providing it to us, you grant ProCasino a worldwide, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, modify, distribute, transmit, display, and create derivative works of the User Content for any purpose. You affirm that you own or possess the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and authorize ProCasino to use any patent, trademark, trade secret, copyright, or other proprietary rights in the User Content you submit. You agree not to submit any User Content that is false, misleading, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, indecent, lewd, harassing, threatening, abusive, inflammatory, or otherwise objectionable, as determined by ProCasino in its sole discretion. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us at procasino@gmail.com. We will do our best to respond to your inquiry in a timely manner. pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - ProCasino 18+ ProCasino Home Choose us Our promise Our products Why are we Services Privacy Policy ProCasino strives to ensure utmost customer satisfaction. We acknowledge that there may be instances where a customer's expectations aren't fully met. Therefore, we provide a comprehensive 30-day return policy. If, for any reason, you are dissatisfied with your purchase, you have the option to return it within 30 days of receipt for a full refund or exchange. For a return to be processed, the product must remain in its original condition and packaging, including all attached tags and labels. It is essential that the product is in a resalable state. Should the item be returned damaged or used, ProCasino reserves the right to decline the return or deduct costs for necessary repairs or cleaning from the refund amount. To initiate a return, please contact us at procasino@gmail.com to obtain a return authorization number. Once you have received the authorization number, please ship the product to us at the address provided, along with a copy of the original receipt or invoice. We recommend using a trackable shipping method to ensure that the product is not lost or damaged in transit. Upon receipt of the returned product, ProCasino will conduct a thorough inspection to ensure it meets the aforementioned conditions. Assuming the product is in a resalable state, we will promptly proceed with the requested refund or exchange. Refunds will be processed back to the original method of payment used during purchase. Kindly allow up to 10 business days for the refund transaction to be completed. At ProCasino, safeguarding our customers' privacy is paramount. We are steadfast in our commitment to never sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties without your explicit consent. Any personal data you share with us is strictly utilized for processing your orders and enhancing our service offerings. When you place an order or create an account on our website, we may collect essential personal details such as your name, email address, mailing address, and phone number. Additionally, we may gather information regarding your browsing and purchasing behavior on our platform to improve our services and deliver a more tailored experience. We implement industry-standard security protocols to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. However, it's important to note that while these measures are robust, no security system can guarantee absolute protection. ProCasino maintains the right to decline service to any individual for any reason deemed appropriate. Additionally, we retain the right to cancel any orders that we suspect may be fraudulent or violate our terms and conditions. By utilizing our website, you agree to indemnify and release ProCasino, along with its officers, directors, employees, and agents, from any and all claims, damages, or liabilities arising from or connected with your use of our products or website. For a return to qualify, the product must remain in its original condition and packaging, with all tags and labels intact. It must also be in a condition suitable for resale. In the event that the product is returned damaged or used, we reserve the prerogative to refuse the return or deduct expenses for any essential repairs or cleaning from the refund. Upon receiving the returned item, ProCasino will conduct an inspection to verify adherence to the aforementioned conditions. If the product meets the criteria for resale, we will proceed with the requested refund or exchange. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method utilized for the purchase. Please allow up to 10 business days for the refund transaction to be processed. At ProCasino, safeguarding our customers' privacy is of utmost importance. We pledge not to sell, trade, or lease your personal information to third parties without your explicit consent. Any personal data you furnish to us will be strictly utilized for order processing purposes and enhancing our service quality.
